sourcesContent:
<template>
  <!-- 展示我的所有博客列表-->
  <el-menu mode="vertical" @select="chooseBlog">
    <el-button type="primary" @click="createBlog">新建博客</el-button>
  </el-menu>
</template>

<script>
import {DateTime} from 'luxon'

export default {
  name: "showMyBlogs",
  data(){
    return{
      count : 1,
    }
  },
  computed:{
  },
  methods:{
    chooseBlog(index){
      for(let blog of this.myBlogsStore.state.blogList){
        if(blog.id === index){
          this.myBlogsStore.state.blogIdNow = blog;
          return;
        }
      }
      this.myBlogsStore.state.blogIdNow = null;
    },
    createBlog(){
      let blog ={
        id: String(Date.now()),
        title: `新建文章${this.count}`,
        createTime: DateTime.now(),
        content: '',
      };
      this.myBlogsStore.state.blogList.push(blog);
      this.count++;
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    console.log(1);
    console.log(this.$myBlogsState);
  }

}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
